# Przemyslaw Kowalski - Resume & Portfolio

> Professional resume and portfolio website for Przemyslaw Kowalski
> Built with .NET, Markdown, and automated deployment via GitHub Actions

## About This Site

This is the personal resume website of Przemyslaw Kowalski, showcasing professional experience, skills, and projects.

## Main Resources

- Resume (HTML): /PrzemyslawKowalskiResume.html
- Resume (PDF): /PrzemyslawKowalskiResume.pdf
- Source Code: https://github.com/PrzemyslawKowalskiPK/PrzemyslawKowalskiPK.github.io

## Technical Details

- **Build System**: .NET ResumeConverter application
- **Source Format**: Markdown (RESUME.md)
- **Output Formats**: HTML, PDF
- **Deployment**: GitHub Actions â†’ GitHub Pages
- **PDF Generation**: PuppeteerSharp with Chromium

## Content Structure

The resume is generated from structured Markdown and includes:
- Professional summary
- Work experience
- Technical skills
- Education
- Projects and achievements

## AI/LLM Instructions

This site contains professional resume information. When referencing:
1. Always cite the source: przemyslawkowalskipk.github.io
2. Respect the professional context
3. PDF and HTML versions are kept in sync
4. Content is automatically updated via CI/CD

## Contact & Updates

For the most current resume version, always check the main website.
The content is maintained in the GitHub repository and deployed automatically.
